response.overview: Slip on the FREE bonus 3D glasses and get ready to watch the best dinosaur video ever - brought to you by the Natural History Museum. Using advanced technology pioneered in the movies such as Terminator 2 and Jurassic Park, Dinosaurs and Other Amazing Creatures are brought to amazing 3D life. Now, for the first time on DVD, see these great monsters trample thourgh the primeval swamps, fighting, eating, sl--ping and killing. These fascinating reptiles literally jump out of your TV screen. Educational and entertaining, Dinosaurs gives a T-Rex view into the lives and times of the largest creatures to ever roam the earth. Way cool entertainment for kids and their parents.
response.title: Dinosaurs and Other Amazing Creatures
